content.rendered:
Go Longer
Reduce Maintenance
Go Cleaner
Reduce GHG Emissions
Go Further
Reduce Fuel Burn
We set the standard for Diesel-Hydrogen Assist Technology (D-HAT™). Our products offer a triple bottom line improvement, helping diesel fleet operators improve engine performance, reduce fuel and maintenance costs, and achieve cleaner engine operation.
Our Products
D-HAT™ Technology

Diesel: The Workhorse Of Our Global Economy

Diesel packs more energy than any other carbon-based fuel. It moves more goods for less, so fleet operators make more money. That’s why 90% of all global goods are transported by diesel.
However, diesel accounts for 35% of global greenhouse gas emissions, putting fleet operators under pressure to become cleaner and to transition to zero-emission fuel.

About D-HAT™ The Practical Pathway To Cleaner, More Efficient Diesel

Diesel-Hydrogen Assist Technology (D-HAT™) is a certified and warrantied aftermarket onboard hydrogen generator. Through electrolysis, it separates steam distilled water into hydrogen and oxygen, producing pure hydrogen on demand. The hydrogen is infused into the fuel-air mixture of any large diesel engine to enhance the fuel burn.

By delivering hydrogen into an engine, D-HAT™ increases combustion efficiency from approximately 70% up to 93%. This produces more power, burns less fuel, decreases maintenance costs, and reduces emissions.

About D-HAT™ Technology

Our SolutionsFor Any Diesel Engine

On Road D-HAT™

Semi Tractors, Buses

Off Road D-HAT™

Genset, Rail, Mining, Green Hydrogen Power, Filling Stations

Marine D-HAT™

Marine Vessels and Transport
Our D-HAT™ Products

A Triple Bottom Line Improvement

For diesel fleet operators up against razor-thin margins, D-HAT™ hydrogen generators are an effective way to contribute to operational efficiency and increased profitability. By squeezing out more energy per combustion event, D-HAT™ is proven to increase fuel mileage, decrease engine maintenance and reduce emissions, delivering a triple bottom line improvement to your operations.

Improve Engine Performance

Increase the performance, productivity and longevity of your diesel equipment. Up to 93% combustion efficiency.

What it does

D-HAT™’s hydrogen-assisted technology helps diesel fuel burn more completely, producing increased combustion efficiency for improved engine performance.

How it helps

Increases torque, delivering more power using less fuel, thereby, improving overall performance, utilization and longevity of your diesel assets.

Increase Operating Profitability

Increase fuel economy by up to 10% and decrease maintenance costs up to 30%. Go further with fuel and maintenance savings.

What it does

Fast-burning hydrogen causes the diesel fuel to burn more completely, producing fewer partially burned hydrocarbon emissions, so your diesel-powered equipment runs cleaner and more efficiently longer.

How it helps

By eliminating carbon build up inside the engine, D-HAT™ will increase fuel savings and decrease maintenance costs.

Reduce Environmental Impact

Reduce harmful emissions to below existing EPA and CARB standards.

What it does

D-HAT™ increases the combustion speed, thereby, more completely burning the hydrocarbons in the fuel. Less partially burned fuel means far fewer pollutants.

How it helps

Reduce the harmful effects of pollution from your fleet operations to below existing EPA and CARB standards.

Hydrogen On Demand By The Numbers

No matter the metric used—engine performance, financial gains, or environmental impact — D-HAT™ takes your diesel fleet operations further.

Engine Performance

up to 0 %

Increased efficiency of combustion for a more complete burn.

Fleet Managers:

Learn how D-HAT™ can increase the torque, efficiency, and performance of your diesel fleet.

Operating Profitability

up to 0 %

Increased fuel savings, decreased maintenance costs.

Financial Officers:

Learn how D-HAT™ can increase your profitability through reduced fuel and maintenance cost improvements.

Environmental Impact

up to 0 %

Reduced environmental footprint: CO2 (Carbon Dioxide), NOx (Nitrogen Oxides), CO (Carbon Monoxide), and THC (Total Hydrocarbons).

Sustainability Officers:

Learn how D-HAT™ can immediately lower the environmental impact of your diesel fleet operations.

Our D-HAT™ Products

D-HAT™ 1000

D-HAT™ 1000

Our most compact unit for semi tractors, crane operators and other small diesel powered equipment.

For engines sized between 9 and 15 liters displacement.
D-HAT™ 3000

D-HAT™ 3000

For smaller diesel power generators and off-road diesel engines.

Made for engines between 20 and 80 liters displacement.

D-HAT™ 6000

D-HAT™ 6000

For railroad applications and large diesel power generators.

For engines between 80 and 180 liters displacement.

D-HAT™ 12000+

D-HAT™ 12000+

For large railroad applications, oil & gas fracking pumps, and maritime bunker fueled engines.

Made for engines larger than 180 liters displacement.

D-HAT™ 6000Case Study: Locomotive

We tested our D-HAT™ technology on a large, 2 stroke locomotive diesel engine in a normal operations study. The D-HAT™ 6000 delivered a 24% reduction in fuel consumption, a massive reduction of harmful exhaust emissions, and less frequent engine maintenance.

D-HAT™ makes a difference you can see:

View the Full Case Study
